divs: sighting detailsi was standing in my driveway facing north, approx. 10:45, with 4 other people (all witnessed the same thing) 3 orange lights appeared traveling south\southwest. lights were moving very slow, not blinking, stayed in a triangle formation for a good 20-30 seconds, disappeared behind cloud and did not come out. this happened on july 4th but absolutely were not fireworks.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Deerfield Beach
There were no other sightings in Deerfield Beach on or around July 4th 2011
